nodes.text: The HCT-2001 Dragon-class Reugeot 905, also known as the Trandoshan prisoner ship, also known as the Trandoshan transport, or Trandoshan slave ship, was a vessel used by Trandoshans to ferry prisoners intended to be hunted as prey on the moon Wasskah. The HCT-2001 was also later used by pirate gangs, including that of the Syvik Delegation.
